reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the color and the fit. Wore them to my lower body dumbbell workout today and they performed beautifully. Love these as an alternative to leggings that are still flattering. Maybe less supportive at the waist than some leggings I own, more medium than compression. They're still high waisted, look good, and comfortable. Gonna get more colors for sure

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When I say these are the best shorts out there I truly mean it! I own gymshark and AYBL both great but I would rather buy these !! They are buttery soft and look phenomenal! They stay in place and don’t ride up. They have a ton of stretch, I am 5’2 and about 143 lbs I got a medium but definitely sizing down for the next pair I buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Shorts, but Packaging Falls Short
reviews.reviewText: Product (5/5): The material used is of excellent quality, providing a soft and lightweight feel against the skin. They are breathable and perfect for hot summer days or intense workouts. I also appreciate the attention to detail with the stitching, which adds to the durability and overall aesthetic appeal of the shorts. The elastic waistband ensures a secure and comfortable fit without feeling restrictive.Packaging (1/5): I was taken aback by the disappointing presentation. The shorts were simply folded and stuffed into a plastic bag, lacking any form of attractive packaging or attention to detail. As someone who appreciates a delightful unboxing experience, this was a bit of a letdown

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So close to being perfect
reviews.reviewText: My only complaint is that they're so thin & not sweat proof. I know its normal to have sweat marks and I shouldn't care, but it makes me feel self conscious. I have the matching top and with the shorts its so flattering on, the color is beautiful and they're very comfortable. They don't ride up my legs when squatting, but I don't wear them as much as I want to because of the sweat stains, hence the 4 stars.For sizing reference I'm 5'6", size 0-2 pants and got the XS, they fit perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Run to get these!
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely LOVE these! Gives your booty a nice lift and squat proof and super comfortable! I wear these at the gym and under my jeans because it just makes my butt look amazing 😂I’m 5’2 155 lbs and I got a medium prob could have gotten a small but im pretty happy with the medium! Will size down when I drop a few lbs! Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: True to size! Also sizing up, they make a very comfy lounge short! The material is so soft and stretchy, but supportive where needed. The color options are great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Length perfect! Stay put! Seams in the right places!
reviews.reviewText: Alright ya'll...I have ordered probably 15 different brands of bike shorts from amazon and here is the winner. 5 inches is the perfect inseam length — I have muscular legs but carry a little extra fat on my inner thighs and these don't squeeze or cut off at an unflattering length (sorry 6 inch shorts, you're too long...4 inch shorts can look cute if standing still, but up they go once any movement takes place). NOTE - I normally am a M-L (amazon auto size recommended L) but followed the size guide and ordered and XL. Probably could have done a L, too, but happy with my choice.I didn't really believe it was possible for bike shorts to stay in place while working out if your thighs touch and your shorts aren't like, 7 inches long BUT I'm here to tell you I was wrong. These stay. The material is nice (some others I ordered were a liiitttle more luxe feelings, but they ride up and these don't). The fabric is not too compressive, not too loose. I would say they are on the less compressive side of bike shorts, but definitely suck you in more than soft loungey bike shorts.The material is a tiiiiny bit see through if you stretch it and hold it to the light, but you have to really try. I ordered a little bigger and I wear a loose shirt with them so I'm not too concerned. If I was wearing a crop top and doing lots of squats, I might check more carefully.Finally, I passed these by initially due to the butt scrunch, which I didn't want. It's not a big deal/super noticeable...especially with a loose shirt. The rest of the features make it acceptable. No cameltoe thanks to the lack of front seam, and no uni-butt due to the presence of a back seam (hard to find a brand that gets this right).Get yours now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good shorts but not functional for working out in
reviews.reviewText: To be fair, I do love these shorts and I own 2 pairs. However, these are not actually functional for cycling they roll up the thighs constantly while biking or walking long distances. They’re great for every day wear and going under dresses just don’t make plans to wear these “biker” shorts biking. If they weren’t advertised as athletic/biking I would probably be giving it a 5 star review because I really do love them and I wear them all the time. I’m a thick girl so I was hesitant about the biker short trend, I thought they would pinch my thighs like a tube of sausage. These are a good length and not very compressional so they don’t cut off my thighs but they also don’t hold on to my legs while running or biking which was the original reason I got them.
Dan súper bonita forma y no transparentan; la tela súper suavecita y color hermoso

Okay so ordering things on Amazon I am obviously super skeptical, and ngl when I pulled these out of the bag I was like wtf is this material because it was so different to what I’m used to, but I actually love these.The material is stretchy and comfortable. It’s pretty thin and not super compressive, but honestly I’m not concerned about that because some compressive materials actually bring out my lower stomach more since I have a short torso and the compression falls on my ribs. The seam on the butt is very flattering on the glutes and doesn’t look like a butt scrunch at all. It could be more obvious in lighter colours, but in the black it gives you a very natural lift. Since I ordered a small, I was also worried about the leg seams pressing on my thighs and making them look like little sausages, but that is also surprisingly not an issue which I can’t say about a lot of shorts. Overall, the waist fits perfect, my butt looks great, and the bottom leg seam doesn’t dig into my thighs. They also seem to be squat proof.For reference: (usually a small in leggings and a small to medium in shorts)- waist: 28”- stomach: 33.5”- hips: 39”- thighs: 23.5”

Die Hose sitzen richtig gut, vor allem an den Beinen und Po.Das Material fühlt sich sehr weich an und man fühlt sich nicht eingeengt wie bei manch anderen.Das einzige negative das sein kann das sie leicht an den Oberschenkeln hoch rollen können bei Übungen wie z.B Krafttraining aber das ist ja nichts schlimmes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I cannot rate these highly enough. I always wear these for leg day; they do not budge. They are squat proof and deadlift proof. Honestly, I would wear them all the time if I could get away with it, they are just so comfortable. Even though they are imported from the US to the UK they are great value for money and arrived in less than a week, I ordered a second pair very quickly after testing out my first, and I will very likely buy more. They wash incredibly well too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Doesn’t lift or hold you in
reviews.reviewText: The fabric is too thin to hold your tummy in/do much to lift your booty up. In fact, it feels like it flattens the booty a little. If the fabric was thicker, I think this would have worked a lot better. The scrunch detailing could have gone higher. That said, this is squat proof, but not VPL free because of the thin material. Material is decent to wear and comparable to UA’s quick drying fabrics.Colour wise, it was true to photos. Size, I got a S. This fits me quite well. My waist is 25.5inches while my hips are 35”. 165cm and 51kg if you need those stats as well to gauge what size to get. The fabric has stretch to it.Personally, I wouldn’t recommend to get this because it’s not flattering for me. Will work better for someone with a bigger booty and a very flat stomach.
